Tolkien-related events that took place in 1904.

content.title: January
content.content: ? - Ronald and Hilary Tolkien fall ill with measles.

content.title: April
content.content: ? - Mabel Tolkien is diagnosed with diabetes.

content.title: November
content.content:
14 - Mabel Tolkien dies at the age of 34 died after six days in a diabetic coma.
24 - Actor John Wyse is born.
? - Ronald and Hilary Tolkien move in with their Aunt, Beatrice Suffield.

content.title: Late 1904/Early 1905
content.content:
? - After the death of his mother, the guardianship of Tolkien and his brother Hilary is taken over by Father Francis Xavier Morgan, a priest of the Birmingham Oratory.
Years
1901 1902 1903 1904 1905 1906 1907
